dcterms:creator: T. Davidson
D. Warmsley
M. Macy
I. Weber
dcterms:description: A dataset derived from a large archive of tweets collected using a Twitter API, containing tweets that have been annotated for hate speech and offensive language. The dataset includes a total of 85.4 million tweets from 33,458 Twitter users, with a random sample of 25,000 tweets being judged and annotated by at least three humans.
dcterms:title: Twitter Dataset
